strategy: Replace the gradient-boosted tree model with a neural network architecture (e.g., a multilayer perceptron) using normalized continuous features and one-hot encoded categorical variables. Introduce a new engineered feature: 'Fare_Per_Person' (Fare / (FamilySize + 1)) to capture per-person economic burden, and apply dropout layers to prevent overfitting. Use early stopping during training with a validation split to enhance generalization.
